metadata.description:
Collect and trade Mecha components to build true 3D, metaverse ready avatars in your secret immersive workshop.

In 3000 AD the Mechas were destroyed during the Great Purge. But now you have the opportunity to bring them back and explore a dystopian Tokyo as we realize the full potential of the LAPIX-ZERO metaverse activation.

As a holder you will become part of the most empowered Web3 community and gain access to exclusive IRL and digital events, the LAPIX Creator Fund and so much more. Join the journey as we build LAPIX-ZERO into a global brand.
metadata.name: Part #0001
